# `commandline` for [core](/commands/categories/core.md)

<div class='command-title'>View the current command line input buffer.</div>

## Signature

```> commandline {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output |
| ------- | ------ |
| nothing | string |


## Subcommands:

| name                                                                 | type    | usage                                         |
